title: Analyst looking for team
body:
Hello everyone,

I am a aspiring analyst looking for a team to help improve their performance both individually and as a team. My goal is to be apart of a team that makes it to the OPL and I want to work with them to get there.

I am looking for a team who is serious about trying to get into the competitive scene.

My personal experience in analysing is not huge so it would be experience for all involved.

I am also free to help individuals of all ranks improve their individual game so feel free to let me know if you would like to work together for that as well.

If you have any questions or are interested in working  comment below.

replies.body:
Hey :)

Just removed your email for privacy reasons so you don't have 10007 nigerian princes blowing up your email. Just get players to add you in game instead. 

Good luck in your search :D

Have added your account AcexShadow.

Will talk to you about a good opportunity to work with our team!

Cheers
I'd like to talk to you about this sometime in depth. I'll add you
